name: Global Game jam 2023 (Notgoyome)
description:
The theme of this 2023 Global Game Jam was Root.

OTOSU

A game jam with :

- MAUREL Edgar  edgar à ski#9902 (code)

- BERNARD Florie 𝐹𝑙𝑜𝑤𝑧𝑜𝑢#0035 (2D artist)

- TRAN Guillaume  guigui#0346 (code)

- ALCALA Jordan DEMETEROS#2812 (sfx)

- CHERPIN Maxime Mexan#2861 (game design)

- GLAUDE Robin Jay Fynn#6532 (3D artist, vfx, code)

Control :

Mouse : Control the direction of the ink drop 

What is OTOSU ?

Otosu is a 48h game jam made by first year students !

The Game is about a man who was drawing a tree but dropped ink from the bottle on the page, making a root. the goal is to get the biggest root and the more it is, the more beautiful it is !
